channel.title: Is this possible?
channel.description: s it possible to add the Air Guitar emote to a 317 server? :confused: because alot of the people would like to have that emote on the server cause its a more new emote and it rocks! If it is possible can you post like a short specific tutorial on how to add it? Thanks :D

item.title: Is this possible?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnage_Sh0w Pwnage Sh0w
item.description:
@Pwnage_Sh0w wrote:

Bigh fuck off noob. I’d like to see you try and code this yourself, WITHOUT TUTORIALS!

Read full topic

item.title: Is this possible?
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“fallenftw900, post:3, topic:233765”]no one knows how yet. I would guess you could but you would have to add a buttom and stuff. I would like to see you try, would be great if you could.

REP if you found me useful :)[/quote]I lol’d irl because you provided NO help whatsoever, anyone could of said that, then you go and ask for rep… Fucking moparscaper.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this possible?

item.description:

[quote=“fallenftw900, post:3, topic:233765”]no one knows how yet. I would guess you could but you would have to add a buttom and stuff. I would like to see you try, would be great if you could.

REP if you found me useful :)[/quote]you have to make models with frames, and all that crap which is pretty out there. And it’s called an action button, that you put into a packet.

[quote="`Worx, post:5, topic:233765"][quote author=fallenftw900 link=topic=308269.msg2464740#msg2464740 date=1222646997]
REP if you found me useful
[/quote]

-1 internet.[/quote] + badass.
